# Motherduck

![](reference/figures/md_logo.png)

## Overview

This is a collection of utilities to help with the management,
administration and navigation of [duckdb](https://duckdb.org/) database
either locally on your computer or in the cloud via
[motherduck](https://motherduck.com/)

Database management is incredibly easy in R with fantastic packages such
as [DBI](https://dbplyr.tidyverse.org/) and
[dbplyr](https://dbplyr.tidyverse.org/), however some databases have
specific extensions or utilities that are aren’t readily accessible via
this packages

{md} pack simplifies these common database administration task with easy
to understand syntax. {md} is built upon
[DBI](https://dbplyr.tidyverse.org/) and returns a lazy DBI object so
that you can further fully integrate your data with
[dbplyr](https://dbplyr.tidyverse.org/)

## Future ambition

Eventually, I’ll use the learning from this package to create a meta DB
utilities package so that regardless if you’re in snowflake, DuckDB,
Redshift, etc you will have generalized functions that work across your
database types

This is very much work in progress – I’ll eventually transition to the
[R7](https://rconsortium.github.io/S7/articles/S7.html) object system
but just want to get some usage first before deciding on the
architecture and structure.

Please create an issue if you have any comments or requests or reach out
if you have any feedback.

## What do I need to use this?

- [duckdb](https://duckdb.org/) R package installed on your computer
- A [motherduck](https://motherduck.com/) account
- A motherduck access token which you you can be saved to your R
  environment file with
  [`usethis::edit_r_environ()`](https://usethis.r-lib.org/reference/edit.html)

``` r
con_md <- connect_to_motherduck("MOTHERDUCK_TOKEN")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`alter_table_schema()`](alter_table_schema.md) : Move Tables from One
  Schema to Another
- [`cd()`](cd.md) : Change Active Database and Schema
- [`config_csv`](config_csv.md) : DuckDB CSV read configuration
  (config_csv)
- [`config_db`](config_db.md) : DuckDB runtime database configuration
  (config_db)
- [`config_excel`](config_excel.md) : DuckDB Excel read configuration
  (config_excel)
- [`config_parquet`](config_parquet.md) : DuckDB Parquet read
  configuration (config_parquet)
- [`configure_md_user_settings()`](configure_md_user_settings.md) :
  Configure a MotherDuck user's settings
- [`connect_to_motherduck()`](connect_to_motherduck.md) : Create
  connection to motherduck
- [`copy_tables_to_new_location()`](copy_tables_to_new_location.md) :
  Copy Tables to a New Database/Schema
- [`create_database()`](create_database.md) : Create (If Not Exists) and
  Switch to a Database
- [`create_if_not_exists_share()`](create_if_not_exists_share.md) :
  Create a MotherDuck database share if it does not exist
- [`create_md_access_token()`](create_md_access_token.md) : Create a
  MotherDuck access token
- [`create_md_user()`](create_md_user.md) : Create a new MotherDuck user
- [`create_or_replace_share()`](create_or_replace_share.md) : Create or
  replace a MotherDuck database share
- [`create_schema()`](create_schema.md) : Create a Schema in a Database
  if It Does Not Exist
- [`create_table()`](create_table.md) : Create or Append a Table from a
  Tibble or DBI-Backed Table
- [`delete_and_create_schema()`](delete_and_create_schema.md) : Drop and
  Recreate a Schema in a MotherDuck / DuckDB Database
- [`delete_database()`](delete_database.md) : Drop a Database
- [`delete_md_access_token()`](delete_md_access_token.md) : Delete a
  MotherDuck user's access token
- [`delete_md_user()`](delete_md_user.md) : Delete a MotherDuck user
- [`delete_schema()`](delete_schema.md) : Drop a Schema from a Database
- [`delete_table()`](delete_table.md) : Drop a Table
- [`describe_share()`](describe_share.md) : Describe a MotherDuck share
- [`drop_share()`](drop_share.md) : Drop a MotherDuck share
- [`install_extensions()`](install_extensions.md) : Install
  DuckDB/MotherDuck Extensions
- [`launch_ui()`](launch_ui.md) : Launch the DuckDB UI in your browser
- [`list_all_databases()`](list_all_databases.md) : List Databases
  Visible to the Connection
- [`list_all_tables()`](list_all_tables.md) : List All Tables Visible to
  the Connection
- [`list_current_schemas()`](list_current_schemas.md) : List Schemas in
  the Current Database
- [`list_current_tables()`](list_current_tables.md) : List Tables in the
  Current Database and Schema
- [`list_extensions()`](list_extensions.md) : List MotherDuck/DuckDB
  Extensions
- [`list_fns()`](list_fns.md) : List Database Functions
  (DuckDB/MotherDuck)
- [`list_md_active_accounts()`](list_md_active_accounts.md) : List
  active MotherDuck accounts
- [`list_md_user_instance()`](list_md_user_instance.md) : List a
  MotherDuck user's instance settings
- [`list_md_user_tokens()`](list_md_user_tokens.md) : List a MotherDuck
  user's tokens
- [`list_owned_shares()`](list_owned_shares.md) : List all shares owned
  by the current user
- [`list_setting()`](list_setting.md) : List Database Settings
- [`list_shared_with_me_shares()`](list_shared_with_me_shares.md) : List
  all shares shared with the current user
- [`list_shares()`](list_shares.md) : List MotherDuck Shares
- [`load_extensions()`](load_extensions.md) : Load and Install
  DuckDB/MotherDuck Extensions
- [`pwd()`](pwd.md) : Print Current MotherDuck Database Context
- [`read_csv()`](read_csv.md) : Read a CSV file into a DuckDB/MotherDuck
  table
- [`read_excel()`](read_excel.md) : Read an Excel file into a
  DuckDB/MotherDuck table
- [`show_current_user()`](show_current_user.md) : Show current database
  user
- [`show_motherduck_token()`](show_motherduck_token.md) : Show Your
  MotherDuck Token
- [`summary(`*`<tbl_lazy>`*`)`](summary.md) : Summarize a Lazy DBI Table
- [`upload_database_to_md()`](upload_database_to_md.md) : Upload a Local
  Database to MotherDuck
- [`validate_and_print_database_loction()`](validate_and_print_database_loction.md)
  : validate and Pprint your database location
- [`validate_con()`](validate_con.md) : Validate connection is DuckDB
- [`validate_extension_install_status()`](validate_extension_install_status.md)
  : Validate Installed MotherDuck/DuckDB Extensions
- [`validate_extension_load_status()`](validate_extension_load_status.md)
  : Validate Loaded MotherDuck/DuckDB Extensions
- [`validate_md_connection_status()`](validate_md_connection_status.md)
  : Validate Mother Duck Connection Status
